description:
This course explores an aspect of the novel intensively, asking how novels work and what they do to us and for us. Specific course topics will vary from year to year. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: ADV. TOPICS IN NARRATIVE: Narrative and the Representation of Cultural Difference
